segment.source: How to Deploy the App-V 4.6 and the App-V 5.0 Client on the Same Computer
segment.target: How to Deploy the App-V 4.6 and the App-V 5.0 Client on the Same Computer

segment.source: How to Deploy the App-V 4.6 and the App-V 5.0 Client on the Same Computer
segment.target: How to Deploy the App-V 4.6 and the App-V 5.0 Client on the Same Computer

segment.source: How to Deploy the App-V 4.6 and the App-V 5.0 Client on the Same Computer
segment.target: How to Deploy the App-V 4.6 and the App-V 5.0 Client on the Same Computer

segment.source: Note: App-V 4.6 has exited Mainstream support.
segment.target: Note: App-V 4.6 has exited Mainstream support.

segment.source: The following assumes that the App-V 4.6 SP3 client is already installed.
segment.target: The following assumes that the App-V 4.6 SP3 client is already installed.

segment.source: Use the following information to install the App-V 5.0 client (preferably, with the latest Service Packs and hotfixes) and the App-V 4.6 SP3 client on the same computer.
segment.target: Use the following information to install the App-V 5.0 client (preferably, with the latest Service Packs and hotfixes) and the App-V 4.6 SP3 client on the same computer.

segment.source: For supported versions, requirements, and other planning information, see Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V.
segment.target: For supported versions, requirements, and other planning information, see Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V.

segment.source: To deploy the App-V 5.0 client and App-V 4.6 client on the same computer
segment.target: To deploy the App-V 5.0 client and App-V 4.6 client on the same computer

segment.source: Install the App-V 5.0 SP3 client on the computer that is running the App-V 4.6 version of the client.
segment.target: Install the App-V 5.0 SP3 client on the computer that is running the App-V 4.6 version of the client.

segment.source: For best results, we recommend that you install all available updates to the App-V 5.0 SP3 client.
segment.target: For best results, we recommend that you install all available updates to the App-V 5.0 SP3 client.

segment.source: Convert or re-sequence the packages gradually.
segment.target: Convert or re-sequence the packages gradually.

segment.source: To convert the packages, use the App-V 5.0 package converter and convert the required packages to the App-V 5.0 (.appv) file format.
segment.target: To convert the packages, use the App-V 5.0 package converter and convert the required packages to the App-V 5.0 (.appv) file format.

segment.source: To re-sequence the packages, consider using the latest version of the Sequencer for best results.
segment.target: To re-sequence the packages, consider using the latest version of the Sequencer for best results.

segment.source: For more information about publishing packages, see How to Publish a Package by Using the Management Console.
segment.target: For more information about publishing packages, see How to Publish a Package by Using the Management Console.

segment.source: Deploy packages to the client computers.
segment.target: Deploy packages to the client computers.

segment.source: Convert extension points, as needed.
segment.target: Convert extension points, as needed.

segment.source: For more information, see the following resources:
segment.target: For more information, see the following resources:

segment.source: How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to a Converted App-V 5.0 Package for All Users on a Specific Computer
segment.target: How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to a Converted App-V 5.0 Package for All Users on a Specific Computer

segment.source: How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to App-V 5.0 for a Specific User
segment.target: How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to App-V 5.0 for a Specific User

segment.source: How to Convert a Package Created in a Previous Version of App-V
segment.target: How to Convert a Package Created in a Previous Version of App-V

segment.source: Test that your App-V 5.0 packages are successful, and then remove the 4.6 packages.
segment.target: Test that your App-V 5.0 packages are successful, and then remove the 4.6 packages.

segment.source: To check the user state of your client computers, we recommend that you use User Experience Virtualization or another user environment management tool.
segment.target: To check the user state of your client computers, we recommend that you use User Experience Virtualization or another user environment management tool.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for App-V?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: Got an App-V issue?
segment.target: Got an App-V issue?

segment.target: Use the App-V TechNet Forum.
